import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import {GoogleButton} from 'react-google-button' import "./Login.css"; export default function login(props) { const translatelogin = () => { var a = document.querySelector(".Login").style; if (a.transform === "translateY(-2000px)") { a.transform = "translateY(0px)"; } else { a.transform = "translateY(-2000px)"; } }; const [hasAccount,setHasAccount]=useState(false) return ( <> {hasAccount ?
